Services

We, even though noobs, are proud of our skills. We offer the services below:

Web Development

We offer our skills to cater website's needs. May it be creation of your ecommerce site, business portfolio, company website, or even setup of your personal blog. We are open to your needs.

App Development

We can also create desktop applications for you. May it be for your business, enterprise, or personal usage.

Design and Branding

We not just design but help you build your brand with you. We offer branding consultation, logo creation, and design research.

About

Noob Saga's ongoing tale.

  • May 2020

    Noob's First App

    The noobs still have extra time which resulted into them creating their first application that will conquer the world. Though it is just a small project, everything must start with something, right?

  • April 2020

    Noob Saga is born

    Noob Saga was founded due to boredom because of the lockdown caused by the Covid-19 pandemic. Lots of free time were available and the noobs decided to use their time to something useful.

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!

Mobile Hub

A complex mobile site that we've worked on. This mobile site will be the mobile counterpart of multiple desktop sites. We've used multiple technologies to fulfill all the requirements by the client some are jQuery, Vue.Js, sliderJs and SASS for the front-end and Drupal 7 for the Back-end CMS.

  • Client: Gaming Company
  • Date: June 2016
  • Author: Zedrick John Villas

Video Surveillance

Used convolutional neural network for detection and classification of public security threats through video feeds from CCTV cameras. This was presented on a global conference held and organized by a Japan tech organization. The publication can be found on the IEEE Xplore digital library.

  • Client: Global Tech Organization
  • Date: March 2020
  • Author: Engr. Marielet Guillermo

Chatbotss

Delivered chatbots to insurance companies in the Philippines and Hongkong. The bots were used to chat with customers about their policies and investments, and they even give wellness tips to relieve stress of the customers. The bot supports Chinese and English language and continuously learns through its interaction with customers everyday.

  • Client: Insurance Company
  • Date: April 2014
  • Author: Zedrick John Villas
